column4: I added a ppa for latest emacs (package emacs-snapshot) but when I apt-get update/upgrade/install eamcs-snapshot it does't update it and I noticed during update it says Ign for the repo instead of Hit. ideas?
apt-cache policy emacs-snapshot   pastebin the output
you did an apt-get update before the apt-cache command?
that result shows apt-get is not seeing emacs-snapshot from the ppa
